title: How to Apply the Order of Operations

steps.title: Perform any calculations inside the innermost parenthesis (or any other types of grouping symbols) first.
steps.content: Perform any calculations inside the innermost parenthesis (or any other types of grouping symbols) first. Then progress outward. [1] X Research source 12 - 8 ÷ 4 + [(6 + 2) - 3] 2 •3 12 - 8 ÷ 4 + [(8) - 3] 2 •3 12 - 8 ÷ 4 + [5] 2 •3

steps.title: Perform any exponents (roots count too).
steps.content: Perform any exponents (roots count too). [2] X Research source 12 - 8 ÷ 4 + [5] 2 •312 - 8 ÷ 4 + 25•3

steps.title: Perform any multiplications or divisions, going from left to right.
steps.content: Perform any multiplications or divisions, going from left to right. [3] X Research source 12 - 8 ÷ 4 + 25•312 - 2 + 75

steps.title: Perform any additions or subtractions, going from left to right.
steps.content: Perform any additions or subtractions, going from left to right. [4] X Research source 12 - 2 + 7510 + 7585
